charges.charge_description: On or about June 2, 1993 defendant falsely and willfully represented himself to be a citizen of the United States and did, at that time, use an identification document knowing that the document is false; and did knowingly and willfully possess, a document prescribed by statute and regulation as evidence of authorized stay and employment in the United States, knowing the document to be falsely made in violation of 18:911, 1546(a) and 1546(b)
